DOC.brief_summary: PICOTS : P : High Caries Risk Patients bilateral class I cavities . I : Glass Ionomer Glass Hybrid Technology . C : Conventional High Viscosity Glass Ionomer . O : Clinical performance ( Functional property Biological property ) use ( World Dental Federation ) Fédération dentaire internationale ( FDI ) criteria dental restoration . T : 1 year . S : Randomized control Trial ( split mouth design ) . Research question : In high caries risk patient class I cavities glass ionomer glass hybrid technology similar clinical performance conventional high viscosity glass ionomer
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Glass Ionomer With Glass Hybrid Technology Versus Conventional High Viscosity Glass Ionomer Class I Cavities High Caries Risk Patients
